md:
giải nghĩa từ "adhere" sang tiếng việt; đưa ra nghĩa tiếng việt theo từ loại và đưa ra câu ví dụ, các từ liên quan.

adhere (verb) /ədˈhɪər/

* Meaning: to stick or hold firmly to something
* Example sentence: The glue will adhere to the surface of the wood.
* Related words: adhere, adhesion, adhesive

adhere (verb) /ədˈhɪər/

* Meaning: to follow or support a particular idea, principle, or rule
* Example sentence: She adheres to a strict diet and exercise routine.
* Related words: adhere, adherence, adherent

Note: The verb "adhere" has two different meanings depending on the context. In the first meaning, it refers to physical sticking or holding, while in the second meaning, it refers to following or supporting an idea or principle.
